root.message: The FREQ_COLL field for indicator 9-1-2, translated into en
root.data:
Calendar

Aviation

Every year by June 10th data for the previous year is available to ICAO Member States at a country level.

Road/Rail/Inland waterways/Pipelines

Data are collected for the reference year starting in September of the following year, and are typically published by the following January. So 2017 data were published in January 2019.
